  ## API Spec
  Upload File
Authorizations:
HTTPBearer
query Parameters
knowledge_base
required
string (Knowledge Base)
Request Body schema: application/json
uploaded_files
required
Array of strings (Uploaded Files)
upload_id
required
string (Upload Id)
parent_path
string (Parent Path)
Default: "root"
useContextualChunking
boolean (Usecontextualchunking)
Default: false
